name: Pilotwings Resort
synopsis: Step into the pilot's seat with glasses-free 3D! Fly a plane, rocket belt, or hang glider through over 40 missions, or for free flying fun. Use your Mii™ character and explore Wuhu Island from the Wii Sports Resort™ game. Take amazing in-game 3D photos, and save them to your Nintendo 3DS photo album!
